original_text: But a wicked person might turn away from the sins that he has been doing. He might decide to obey my laws and do things that are right and good. If he does that, he will certainly continue to live. He will not die as his punishment.
korean_text: 그러나 악인이 만일 그가 행한 모든 죄에서 돌이켜 떠나 내 모든 율례를 지키고 정의와 공의를 행하면 반드시 살고 죽지 아니할 것이라

sentences.original_text: But a wicked person might turn away
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 악한 사람은 돌이킬 수도 있고

sentences.original_text: from the sins that he has been doing
He might decide to obey my laws
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내 법을 순종하기로 결심할 수 있고

sentences.original_text: and do things that are right and good
sentences.korean_translation: 올바르고 선한 것들을 행할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: he will certainly continue to live
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 반드시 계속 살게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will not die as his punishment
